title: Data Cleaning
format: typst
---


```{r}
library('tidyverse')
library('stringr')

```
```{r}
precinct_df <- read.csv('data/g24_sov_by_g24_svprec.csv')

#The *** needs to be treated as NAs 
precinct_df <- precinct_df |>
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~ str_replace_all(., "\\*{3}", "")))


#precinct_df['ASSAIP01':'USSREP01'] <- as.numeric(precinct_df['ASSAIP01':'USSREP01'])
#this didnt work

#This worked to convert the vote counts to doubles
precinct_df <- precinct_df |>
    mutate(across(ASSAIP01:USSREP01, as.numeric))
```
